EGUNJED COPS IN TROUBLE As Drug Suspect Flees EGUNJED COPS IN TROUBLE As Drug Suspect Flees

The trafficker from a Thai prison has landed ten mysterious escape of a Nigerian drug police officers and a colonel in trouble. And It's all because of Egunje, the notorious Nige- rian way of compromising officials. The ten Thai policemen are under investiga- tion for allegedly aiding the detained Nigerian drug trafficker to escape to another country yesterday. Human rights crusader, Chief Gani Fawehinmi, has taken over the prosecution of a $437,000 about N32 million advance fee fraud case, otherwise known as '419', a German-based widow, Mrs. Frieda Springer- Beck filed against Lagos lawyer, Chief Fred Ajudua. An aerial view of the Italian cruise ship, the Achille Lauro, on fire in the Indian ocean off the coast of Somalia taken from a US Navy helicopter last Wednesday. The fire continued to burn yesterday, but passengers were rescued from life boats by ships in the area. Several people are reported to have died. AFP PHOTO. Lagos VIPs Shun Saleh Lagos VIPs Shun Saleh
Charles Owoeye Charles Owoeye

Secretary to the ruling military junta, Al- haji Aminu Saleh, was snubbed by the very important people of Lagos yesterday. Secretary to the ruling military junta, Al- haji Aminu Saleh, was snubbed by the very important people of Lagos yesterday.

The seminar on Chemical Weapons Conven- tion and the Chemical and Allied Industries which he was billed to declare open was poorly attended. There were fewer than 30 guests present at the opening, at the auditorium of the Ikeja Complex of the Manufacturers Association of Nigeria. The auditorium could seat 700 people.
